content: प्रांतः [प्रकृष्टोंऽतः] {@--1@} Edge, margin, border, skirt, verge; प्रांतसंस्तीर्णदर्भाः <ls>Ś. 4. 7.</ls> {@--2@} Corner (as of the lips, eyes &c.); <ls>Māl. 4. 2</ls>; ओष्ठ°, नयन°. {@--3@} Boundary, extremity. {@--4@} Extreme verge, end; यौवनप्रांत <ls>Pt. 4.</ls> {@--5@} A point, tip. {@--6@} The back part.
